Text:
I installed it and then went to install the bug fix but a prompt comes up with two choices and they are both in what I believe is Russian. 

Can anyone tell me what the prompts say?

Installed then uninstalled. When I open ETKA another program open searching for a connection. It does not fnd a connection wether I'm on Wi-Fi or cable. It says no connection to the server found. And when I make a few clicks in ETKA I suddenly get the Blue Screen Of Death.
Has anybody got this to work in Vista yet? cheers
MD-82: Same thing happens to me... anybody know of a version that will actually work?
To all English lads, if you have any problem with changing language toEnglish, let me know, I'll send you the screenshots.
Says permission denied for the crack with the russian prompt. ETKA says hardlock not found.
